response.overview: Linguist, writer and artist Alexey Ulko examines the Soviet influence on the post-Soviet space during his month-long residency in Baku. Researchers living in Baku discuss with artists, artists and ordinary people, questioning the common reality of these countries and the possibility of their future. It examines the paths chosen by countries after leaving the Soviet Union and the risk of losing their identity in the face of these great opportunities. It is impossible to find exact answers to these questions and to predict, we just live in our reality and observe how the individuals created by these ideologies will behave in the international arenas.
response.title: COMMON?!
